title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Ahead of tonight's massive game 6 of the NBA Finals, Colin points out the massive difference between Jayson Tatum and Steph Curry. He reacts to the huge contract the Steelers gave to another defensive player and argues Pittsburgh's days of championship contention are over. He also believes Tom Brady's competitive spirit is nearly at an end after a historically unparalleled career of greatness. Plus, former head coach David Fizdale joins the show to give his analysis on the NBA Finals matchup between the Warriors and the Celtics.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
